ComicInfo.Title: She's No Lady--she's Atrocity™
ComicInfo.Summary: She's No Lady--she's Atrocity™: The Pact battles the Renegades on their home turf--the government facility known as The Center. Atrocity, the leader that the Renegades answer to, convinces the Pact that she is one of the good guys and they agree to work with her.
ComicInfo.Characters: The Pact [Blacklight [Ted Cleaver],Atrocity,Sybil,Slam! [Bobby Sterling],Renegades [Nightstick,Handgunn,Mr. Alexander,Blast!],Cutlass],Dayglo [Shelley Peterson] (cameo)
